title: trivikamam aham
sahitya:
trivikramam aham bhajE dEvadEvam su-vigraham haram vAsudEvam


anupallavi

  pavitritO balam prathIta vibhavam ravi prabham patanatAnila bhavam


caraNam    dharAtmajArccita sarasija caraNam surAni samadana varagaNa caraNam
			(madhyamakAlam)
virAda rAvaNa karAdi kalanisha carAntakam raghukula tilakam 
purAri surucira sarAsa gaurava nirAsakam ratipati janakam
